attributes.action: Provide more NHS dentists in Cornwall.
attributes.additional_details: Provide more NHS dentists in cornwall. Especially for young children.
attributes.background:
The NHS dental waiting list for Cornwall has around 40k patient on it, some waiting over 5 years.
At present the only way to get an app. Is if it's an emergency,  you need to be in severe pain to be seen. Even for young children.
This is ridiculous, going private shouldn't be the only option.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576982

Provision of local NHS dental services is a matter for your local NHS trust and local dental practices, not the Government or House of Commons.
